select
from fapiaoguanli where bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from fapiaoguanli where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaobianhao like concat('%',#{fapiaobianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaoneirong like concat('%',#{fapiaoneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaojine >= concat('',#{fapiaojine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and fapiaojine <= concat('',#{fapiaojine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and jiluren like concat('%',#{jiluren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from fapiaoguanli where 1=1
and bianhao =#{bianhao}

select from fapiaoguanli where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaobianhao like concat('%',#{fapiaobianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaoneirong like concat('%',#{fapiaoneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and fapiaojine >= concat('',#{fapiaojine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and fapiaojine <= concat('',#{fapiaojine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and jiluren like concat('%',#{jiluren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

insert into fapiaoguanli
id,
bianhao, shebeimingcheng, fapiaobianhao, fapiaoneirong, fapiaojine, jiluren,
addtime,

update fapiaoguanli
bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shebeimingcheng = #{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fapiaobianhao = #{fapiaobianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fapiaoneirong = #{fapiaoneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fapiaojine = #{fapiaojine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiluren = #{jiluren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
